data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jantarit, Sopark, Satasook, Chutamas, Deharveng, Louis (2013): The genus Cyphoderopsis Carpenter (Collembola: Paronellidae) in Thailand and a faunal transition at the Isthmus of Kra in Troglopedetinae. Zootaxa 3721 (1): 49-70, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3721.1.2
